message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $140. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $125?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
